LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_konkatana.label: Kon katana replica
LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_konkatana.description:
A replica of the legendary sword Sora Maru Keimitsu, wielded centuries ago by a long gone fox-eared kon.
As the kon are very protective about their blades, they are reluctant to give up information on how to make them. This causes a number of difficulties for those attempting to craft them.

LanguageData.MeleeWeapon_sirokatana.description: A replica of the white katanas often used by the wolf-eared siros. While it's a functional weapon, it's more often used for aesthetic purposes, such as cutting fruit.
